name: react-period-of-stay-input
description: React.js component for entering a period of stay in a hotel: check-in + check-out date

scripts.build: browserify demo.js | uglifyjs > www/bundle.js && (test -d www/better-dom || git clone https://github.com/chemerisuk/better-dom.git -b v1.7.7 www/better-dom) && (test -d www/better-dateinput-polyfill || git clone https://github.com/chemerisuk/better-dateinput-polyfill.git www/better-dateinput-polyfill)

author: Ivan Krechetov <ikr@ikr.su>
